creator: 氣象局
descriptionHtml:
The simple and clear home page meets your needs of daily weather information.
Furthermore, the app provides beautiful background that change according to the weather, alarm assistant, and more weather information.
With Taiwan Weather APP, you can catch the latest weather. Just download now.

Taiwan Weather app features:
•Current conditions
•7-day and 3-hr forecasts and charts
•Sunrise and sunset
•Radar, satellite…and more graph
•Current observation and latest 24-hour data
•Air quality
•Fishery forecasts, tidal forecasts, blue highway forecasts
•Provide my favorite locations and personalize sequence
•Alarm assistant
•Weather check-in
•Unit conversion
•Alert push notifications
•Language: Traditional Chinese / English


Note 1:You can turn off resident notifications using one of the following methods:
(A) Press and hold this resident notification, click on "All Categories" to enter the setting screen, and turn off the "Background Services".
(B) Please go to the "Settings->Apps->Taiwan Weather" , select the "All Notifications" item, and close the "Background Service".

Note 2: The old GCM notification will be closed on April 11, 2019, if not updated to 5.2.0 or above Version will not be able to receive push notification messages anymore.
For more information, please refer:https://developers.google.com/cloud-messaging/
descriptionShort: A major redesign of "Taiwan Weather" has been release !

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1.Adjust data encryption method: Cancel phone permissions
2.Fix the problem: When the phone permission is denied, a prompt appears every time you open the App

descriptionShort: A major redesign of "Taiwan Weather" has been release !

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1、3 hours temperature and apparent temperature curve optimization, you can "check to show" or "uncheck to hide"
2、Add a shortcut for language switching in the main menu
3、Add Google login service and integrate in “Login Service'' item
4、Add "Time Format" to switch 12-hour /24-hour system
5、Add 3-hour forecast data to the widget, and enhance other settings

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

1. Fix the crash issue below Android 5
2.Fix the overlapping problem of widget in some phones.

descriptionShort: A major redesign of "Taiwan Weather" has been release !

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
(1) The recreational locations have added two new categories: "Airport" and "River"
(2) The notification settings now include the addition of a "Flash Flood Alert After Heavy Rain in Mountains" feature.
(3) The time period options for the Blue Highway forecast have been extended to 6 days.
(4) Various issues have been fixed.
(5) The desktop widget error for specific few models has been resolved.

Fixed Android 5 and 6 app crash issues.

v5.6.0
(1) The recreational locations have added two new categories: "Airport" and "River"
(2) The notification settings now include the addition of a "Flash Flood Alert After Heavy Rain in Mountains" feature.
(3) The time period options for the Blue Highway forecast have been extended to 6 days.
(4) Various issues have been fixed.
(5) The desktop widget error for specific few models has been resolved.

title: Taiwan Weather

creator: 交通部中央氣象署(CWA)
descriptionHtml:
The simple and clear home page meets your needs of daily weather information.
Furthermore, the app provides beautiful background that change according to the weather, alarm assistant, and more weather information.
With Taiwan Weather APP, you can catch the latest weather. Just download now.

Taiwan Weather app features:
•Current conditions
•7-day and 3-hr forecasts and charts
•Sunrise and sunset
•Radar, satellite…and more graph
•Current observation and latest 24-hour data
•Air quality
•Fishery forecasts, tidal forecasts, blue highway forecasts
•Provide my favorite locations and personalize sequence
•Alarm assistant
•Weather check-in
•Unit conversion
•Alert push notifications
•Language: Traditional Chinese / English


Note 1:You can turn off resident notifications using one of the following methods:
(A) Press and hold this resident notification, click on "All Categories" to enter the setting screen, and turn off the "Background Services".
(B) Please go to the "Settings->Apps->Taiwan Weather" , select the "All Notifications" item, and close the "Background Service".

Note 2: The old GCM notification will be closed on April 11, 2019, if not updated to 5.2.0 or above Version will not be able to receive push notification messages anymore.
For more information, please refer:https://developers.google.com/cloud-messaging/
descriptionShort: A major redesign of "Taiwan Weather" has been release !

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Due to organizational transformation, Central Weather Bureau (CWB) became Central Weather Administration (CWA) on Sep. 15, 2023.
Please update to v5.7.0 of Taiwan Weather app to keep service alive. All previous versions will be deprecated in coming days.

descriptionShort: A major redesign of "Taiwan Weather" has been release !

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
(1) The forecast data for Inshore Forecasts is extended to 5 days.
(2) For Township Coastal, the 3-hourly forecast is extended to 72 hours, tidal data is extended to 5 days, and a page switching display is implemented.
(3) Improvement of some data presentation methods.
